channel.title: Object Height
channel.description:
I'm having difficulties setting heights of objects using the makeGlobalObject. It spawns the object however it's spawned on height level 0, 1, 2 and 3.
This is my code at the moment: [code] makeGlobalObject(2762, 3500, 2513, 1, 10);//range target [/code] and the function is: [code] public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects [/code]
No height parameter in it :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 21, 2008, 05:45:51 pm[/size][hr]Anyone? :(

item.title: Object Height

item.description:
@oron wrote:

I’m having difficulties setting heights of objects using the makeGlobalObject. It spawns the object however it’s spawned on height level 0, 1, 2 and 3.

This is my code at the moment:

		makeGlobalObject(2762, 3500, 2513, 1, 10);//range target

and the function is:

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects

No height parameter in it :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 21, 2008, 05:45:51 pm[/size][hr]Anyone?
